item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)
item.description: ✏️ I noticed the org hyperlinks in the entries are only visible as plaintext urls (if using content in title). So put org-mode section titles empty and write the content inside the section. Also there was some issue of duplicate entries appearing and I had to set :RSSPERMALINK: property to unique value.

item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)
item.description: ✏️ Connecting the resulting blog to micro.blog requires just the url kinnala.github.io/blog/index.xml. However, I noticed org-mode titles are interpreted as the actual entries if they are nonempty.

item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)
item.description: ✏️ I wanted to blog from org-mode to micro.blog. First I created kinnala/blog repository. Then I installed ox-rss. Finally I wrote this entry in index.org, called org-rss-export-to-rss and committed the resulting files.
